name: Akatorimon
description: Akatorimon is a giant chicken -like Digimon. Its body is covered in creamish white feathers with red feathers on its chest. Its wings are red at the ends while its tail feathers are a fiery red at the tip. The upper mandible of its mouth is covered in rhinotheca with teeth while the lower mandible is covered in feathers with three protruding teeth at the tip. It has orange eyes with slit pupils like a reptile and the crest of fiery red feathers. Its feet each have four talons and a single dewclaw which are all red.
